channel.title: CVE Feed for BloomPixel -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BloomPixel -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-32951|2024-04-24T06:59:03.629Z -- BloomPixel -- Max Addons Pro for Bricks
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in BloomPixel Max Addons Pro for Bricks.This issue affects Max Addons Pro for Bricks: from n/a through 1.6.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-32952|2024-04-24T08:24:27.131Z -- BloomPixel -- Max Addons Pro for Bricks
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in BloomPixel Max Addons Pro for Bricks allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Max Addons Pro for Bricks: from n/a through 1.6.1.
